name: Roadblock
description:
Roadblock is a simple game where you dodge blocks... as a block. I know this is just a Brackeys tutorial, but I think I added enough on my own that I can upload it to Itch.io (the tutorial only shows the movement, obstacles and UI. Things like Bullettime, start and finish animation, music and other things are not in the tutorial and made by me)

This is my first game I ever made (Scratch doesn't count). I am not going to edit this game ever again, it's just me learning the very basics of Unity.

Controls:

A / D = Move left / right

R = Restart level

Ctrl (hold) = Bullettime for 3 seconds (release to stop, 7.5 second cooldown)
